titles: A diuine dictionarie, or, The Bible abreuiated Containing the whole Scripture. Being most necessarie for the present finding out of any part thereof. By T.S. [sic]
author: H. S., fl. 1616.
publisher: Printed by E: Allde for Francis Constable, and are to be solde at his shop in Pauls Church-yard ouer against the great north dore, at the signe of the white Lyon,
notes: The initials "T.S." on title page were corrected in later issues to read "H.S.".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Bible --  Study and teaching --  Early works to 1800.
